channel.title: seismology on Chris Havlin
channel.description: Recent content in seismology on Chris Havlin

item.title: Specifying unrelaxed moduli in the VBRc (version 1.1+)
item.description: The most recent feature release of the VBRc (version 1.1) included some changes that simplify the specification of the unrelaxed moduli used within the VBRc.

item.title: A quick primer on volume rendering of geophysics data with yt
item.description: Over the past couple years I’ve worked on volume rendering of 3D geoscience data using yt in a number of ways.
